input.sentences: it has been hours since i have seen my human .
i wonder if my human is getting me treats and toys .
output.sentences: The dog is very sad because his human went to work.
As the dogs sits and waits for the human to come home for him it feels like hours.
The dog thinks of the toys and treats the human always give him.
The dog smiles thinking of the human.
The dog misses the human very much.
